MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G74 postcode area of East Kilbride. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00am to make a permanent repair to a faulty underground cable at Gateway Lodge and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.38am on the 9th of April 2021.
